New Records: Josh Inglis scored his second T20I century off 43 balls.
Key Match Events: Marcus Stoinis took 4 wickets for 23 runs in 3.4 overs.
George Munsey struck 17 off Xavier Bartlett's first over.
Brandon McMullen was out to a fine running catch by Tim David for 59 off 42 balls.
Brad Currie got one to nip back and clip the top of middle stump, dismissing Travis Head.
Brad Currie induced a false shot from Jake Fraser-McGurk, resulting in a catch by Chris Sole.
Tim David contributed 17 runs in a seven-ball cameo.
Aaron Hardie dismissed Michael Jones for one.
Cameron Green claimed two wickets in two balls.
Pre-Game Insights: Mitchell Marsh lost the toss and Richie Berrington sent Australia into bat.
Post-Match Reflections: Mitchell Marsh praised Josh Inglis and Cameron Green for getting the team out of trouble.
Mitchell Marsh mentioned the possibility of changes for the next match and the opportunity to win the series 3-0.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Foggy conditions delayed the start by 30 minutes.
Six Australian bowlers took at least one wicket.
The final match of the three-match series is in Edinburgh on Saturday.
